props.controlVariant: The color of the control. It defaults to the value of `variant` prop.
props.inset: Applies an indentation to the dividers used in the stepper buttons.
props.max: Specifies the maximum allowable value for the input.
props.min: Specifies the minimum allowable value for the input.
props.step: Defines the interval between allowed values when the user increments or decrements the input

slots.decrement: Slot for customizing the decrement button or icon used to decrease the value of the input.
slots.increment: Slot for customizing the increment button or icon used to increase the value of the input.
